resources.string:
- Don't use water on Electrical Fire 

 - Don't use extinguisher on Gas Fire 

 - Do NOT fight a fire unless it's small or manageable enough for you to confidently handle 

 - If evacuation is impossible stay low and stay in place 

 - STOP DROP AND ROLL

- Remove any jewelry and restrictive clothing 

 - Clean the area with soap and water 

 - Cover area with an adhesive bandage or gauze

- If bleeding, apply pressure to restrict flow of blood 

 - Clean wound with anti-bacterial soap or disinfectant 

 - Cover area with an adhesive bandage or gauze

- Cool burned area with cold water until pain lessens 

 - Cover with a dry, sterile bandage or clean dressing 

 - Do NOT touch area
